price: Uko ni ko abahakanaga ibimenyetso bya Allah bateshwaga ukuri.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yu'faku alladhīna kānū biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
